[b][color=white]New HackerCraft Award[/color][/b]
Hack Forums' own Minecraft server, HackerCraft, is now on its third iteration and the HackerCraft Blue award was added to go with the others. Unlike before, this award is to cover server costs at a cost of $15 USD and is not awarded in-game. As such, the award is only available when there are upcoming fees. A total of 85 users purchased the award within 9 hours and sales are suspended until the next bill comes through. [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244051]>>Source 1[/url][/size][/i] [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=90]>>Source 2[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Closed Account Policy Revised[/color][/b]
To keep out the few who constantly probe for the forum's net income, the awards belonging to members with closed accounts have been revoked. In addition, the awardees of all donation awards bar Gift are no longer listed. [i][size=x-small][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5248175]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]SuperCell Games Forum Introduced[/color][/b]
What was previously a sub forum for Clash of Clans, the popular mobile game, discussion has now been consolidated to support topics across all games from its developer, SuperCell Games. It can be found inside the [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=237]Mobile and Tablet Gaming[/url] section.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OYTT3eC.png[/img][/align]


[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5241907][b]Trust Scan Improvement (#3)[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient has updated the Trust Scan feature for the third time. Check out the new additions here.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244051][b]HackerCraft Blue Award[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient has added a new award to support our official Hack Forums Minecraft server, HackerCraft. The award is currently unavailable, but may be available again for purchase in the future.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244276][b]HackerCraft = Non-Profit[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Omniscient states that HackerCraft is a non-profit project and no payments should be sent to any staff member of the server. In great detail, Omniscient also explains other ways to support the server.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5248175][b]Award Policy Regarding Closed Accounts[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]A recent policy was created in regard to closed accounts. Users with closed accounts will automatically lose all their awards.

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5243453][b]Tutorial Archive // Post your tutorials here (or someone else's).[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2831806][color=#99FF00][b]CypherPunk[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The member, CypherPunk, recently created a mega-thread consisting of various different tutorials and guides from a variety of members. Interested in learning something new? Have an awesome thread to submit?
[color=#333333]---[/color]Post it here. 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5238651][b][LEGENDS] Education Nation Helpdesk[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1138866][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rivalry[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The official Hack Forums group, Legends, have come together to create a help desk in the Education Nation forum. Need help in a certain subject? Legends members will assist the best they can.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5247876][b]What will you do on $1,000,000,000,000 BITCOINS?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3076944][color=#99FF00][b]Norous[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you had the chance to own $1,000,000,000,000 Bitcoins, what would you do with your money?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5247998][b]What would you do as hackforums owner?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3025684][color=#EFEFEF][b]lexors[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Ever imagine you were the owner of Hack Forums? If you had the power Omniscient has, what would you do?

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5211248][b]Yes back again with another giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2360425][color=#EFEFEF][b]FamousHater[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you would like enter the chance to win a L33t, 3P1C, or Ub3r upgrade, test your luck in this giveaway hosted by FamousHater!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5231411][b][Legends] Free $50 Upgrade/Award Giveaway[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1813061][color=#EFEFEF][b]Stazzy[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Stazzy is giving away multiple items for your Hack Forums account. Come check it out now!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5246330][b][ALL ARE WELCOME] Nextbook Flexx Tablet Giveaway![/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3113547][color=#EFEFEF][b]The Producer[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]An easy giveaway to enter to win a brand new tablet. Interested in winning one? This thread is for you.

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244161][b]2,556 day (7 year) feedback thread[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=55709][color=#EFEFEF][b]Glit͙ch[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Glit͙ch, owner of the official Hack Forums group Riptide, recently created a really, really short feedback thread.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5244415][b]My feedback to Omniscient and the HF Staff team.[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2969158][color=#EFEFEF][b]Silicon Valley[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Silicon Valley shared with the community his thoughts about the Hack Forums Staff Team.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5243317][b]Gross Gore PERMANENTLY banned from Twitch.TV[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=691918][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rita Ora ❤️[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Popular League of Legends streamer, Gross Gore has recently been banned on Twitch. You can learn more about the situation, thanks to this thread created by Rita Ora ❤️.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5245005][b]Prince Singer Dies[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3054431][color=#EFEFEF][b]$cumbag[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Famous singer, Prince, recently passed away at the age of 57. Rest in Peace.


[color=transparent]       [/color]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 289

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=1][color=transparent]       [/color]
[align=center][size=large][b][color=white]Support HF News[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#50c072]Gaming News[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#6b80ff]Tech News[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#7B68EE]Hacking News[/color] [color=white]•[/color] [color=#7fcdaf]World News[/color][/b][/size][/align]
[color=transparent]       [/color][/font][/size]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/exp/281/SupportHFN.png[/img][/align]


[align=center]We publish the HF News every week yet we have aged members who don't even know we exist! Wear any of the signatures listed below to support us and spread the word about HF News, HF Wiki, and Writers altogether. 

[color=white][spoiler=[b]Support Signatures[/b]]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/exp/283/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]


[url=http://www.digitalspy.com/gaming/news/a791784/borderlands-3-is-coming-and-everyone-is-probably-going-to-die-horribly/][b][color=white]Borderlands 3 is Coming[/color][/b][/url]
The video game company behind Borderlands, Gearbox Software, announced that Borderlands 3 will be coming soon. Gearbox Software CEO Randy Pitchford has confirmed the making of the new game at PAX East 2016 in Boston, which is taking place now. Although not much has been leaked, Gearbox states that some Easter eggs about the upcoming Borderlands game can be seen in one of their new releases, Battleborn, which is out May 3. The devs teased around a little at PAX East, sharing that they are not sure if they want to call the game Borderlands 3, or rename it to "Borderlands: Origins - Requiem", one of the directors Scott Kester said jokingly. Back in Jan. of 2015, Gearbox was recruiting members of the gaming community to help out with the latest game. In an article from PC Gamer, Gearbox stated they were NOT making a new game, but in actuality they secretly were. The Borderlands team needed some new faces and ideas. Those that attended PAX South and visited Gearbox's hour-long presentation were greeted with [url=http://i.imgur.com/ap8oCBx.jpg]this[/url] photo, which revealed that Gearbox is looking for people interested in the development of the latest Borderlands game.

[url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/major-pro-gaming-league-bans-youporns-gaming-team-/1100-6439137/][b][color=white]Pro Gaming League Bans YouPorn's Gaming Team[/color][/b][/url]
The Electronic Sports League (ESL) recently put a permanent ban on YouPorn's gaming team, Team YP, which will disallow the team to participate in any professional events. The ESL provided an explanation for the ban, stating that pornography is not legal in the markets that they operate in. Supporters and sponsors do not condone any products that can be linked to alcohol, drugs, or any type of pornography. The directors at ESL have shared to the public that they have reached out to the manager of Team YP, explaining the rules and details they must follow, in hopes to show that Team YP was in the wrong for not complying with the rules. However, according to the manager of Team YP, the team has done almost all they can to alter the appearance of the team, which includes the logo which has been changed from "YouPorn" to "YP". In addition, the team has created a safe-for-work website that anyone of all ages can browse [url=http://www.teamyp.com/]here[/url]. The official team website has a brief description of the team in the "About Us" tab, and even includes a list of members and what gamemode they are associated with. The idea of creating such a website was to prevent younger kids from googling "Team YouPorn" and showing up at the affiliate site, YouPorn. Fans can purchase official Team YP t-shirts with a censored version of the logo to show their protest for the team's ban from ESL.

[url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/gears-of-war-4-beta-players-getting-free-avatar-sh/1100-6439143/][b][color=white]Gears of War 4 Beta Players Getting Free Avatar Shirt[/color][/b][/url]
One of the most popular series in the history of Xbox, Gears of War, has a special gift for those interested in playing their latest beta. As of April 18, the beta has only been available for those with early access to the game. During an announcement at PAX East, fans learned that the Gears of War 4 beta will also be out for all Xbox Live Gold members on April 25. At the panel for GoW4, The Coalition, creators of the upcoming game in the Gears of War series, showcased some of the new guns, characters, and gamemodes that the newest game has to offer. The Coalition has also shared that anyone who participates in the beta will be getting an exclusive Xbox Live avatar t-shirt. The last thing announced was a set of new 7" action figures of the main characters that will be purchasable around Fall later this year. PAX East 2016 is the place to be right now if you are looking for some juicy information on upcoming games, or if you are interested in checking out the booths of your current favorite games. Special guest booths from Twitch and newly popular chat/voice service Discord will be making their arrival at PAX East for those interested to meet and greet with the directors.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center]
[img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/exp/281/TechNews.png[/img][/align]


[align=left]
[color=white][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/ps45-will-have-improved-cpu-gpu-and-ram-codenamed-/1100-6438961/][b]PlayStation 4.5 Rumors[/b][/url][/color]
The PlayStation 4 has been a raging success for Sony with more than 37 million consoles sold since its November 2013 release, which is why rumors of a console update seem a bit odd. Yet the PS4.5, code-named "Neo", is very much a reality, according to multiple sources within Sony and several video game studios. The yet-to-be-announced console will boast better processor speed, memory bandwidth, and graphics capabilities than the standard PS4 available. No price has been provided, but previous reports indicate that the Neo would sell at $399. 

[color=white][url=http://view.microsoftemails.com/?qs=d4571e5371e27f55502ed8d501a6b81b0837f9743115c00e56c013293c9e6796f2fbbee4862f​4f5bb1176de05a79f28a606581310db7928e3f6b7830662454235565d1b5780a87b7][b]Microsoft to Reduce OneDrive Cloud Storage[/b][/url][/color]
Microsoft announced on their OneDrive blog today that they are officially reducing the amount of OneDrive storage available for free users. As of July 27th, the free amount of storage allotted for OneDrive users will officially decrease from 15GB to 5GB and anything outside of that will be lost in the sauce. OneDrive will also cease to provide a camera roll bonus of 15GB on that day. Previously, this allotted users enough storage to backup any pictures that were taken, as long as automatic backup syncing was enabled.

[color=white][url=http://www.opera.com/blogs/desktop/2016/04/free-vpn-integrated-opera-for-windows-mac/][b]Opera Browser Bundles Free VPN For Users[/b][/url][/color]
Opera announced that it has built a free virtual private network (VPN) service into the latest version of its browser for Windows and OS X, becoming the first major browser maker to introduce a built-in VPN client. The latest version of its browser is only available via their "Developer" channel, and added that the VPN service is currently free of charge, and has no limits in traffic or usage time. Opera users can choose between the firm's VPN servers in the US, Canada, and Germany — with the promise that the list of locations will grow longer soon.
[/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UwocR3l.png[/img][/align]


[url=http://www.hackersnewsbulletin.com/2016/04/fear-of-secret-surveillance-made-fbi-director-put-a-tape-over-his-webcam.html][b][color=white]FBI Places Tape Over Webcam in Fear of Surveillance[/color][/b][/url]
James Comey, FBI Director, gave a speech on privacy and encryption at Kenyon University last week. During the Q&A portion of his presentation, Comey stated that he used to put tape over his personal laptop's webcam. He was arguing about the encryption techniques used by big corporations and offered to their clients, and how they're hard to pass by law enforcement even with a court order. It's both ironic and hypocritical that a guy who asks tech corporations to make end-to-end encrypted systems perceptible by government entities, is trying to escape the espionage himself.

[url=http://www.ehackingnews.com/2016/04/adobe-flash-vulnerabilities-more-in.html][b][color=white]Exploit Kit Writers Focusing More on Adobe Flash[/color][/b][/url]
In a study done by NTT Group, they report that exploit kit writers are focusing more on Adobe Flash exploits. In 2015, the top 10 exploits were Adobe Flash vulnerabilities. In 2013, there was only one exploit in the top 10 for Flash, and eight for Java. The main reason for this change is the fact that the number of Java vulnerabilities is dwindling, while Flash vulnerabilities have gone up in numbers four-fold. The report consists of trends dating back to 1999.

[url=http://thehackernews.com/2016/04/hack-facebook-account.html][b][color=white]Hacker Installed a Backdoor on Facebook Servers to Steal Passwords[/color][/b][/url]
Facebook is the company-to-hack of the decade. They're huge. It's a dream for any hacker to hack Facebook, seeking a great monetary bounty for the exploit, or for malicious purposes. The Facebook Security Team recently found that a hacker had breached into their servers, and installed a backdoor designed to steal employee's login information. However, because the backdoor was found on the Facebook corporate server and not a public server, regular accounts are safe. However, the company would never have known if one of their own whitehat hackers hadn't found the backdoor.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/R8BL7M8.png[/img][/align]


[url=http://time.com/4300477/bluefin-tuna-population-overfishing/][b][color=white]Pacific Bluefin Population Experiencing Dramatic Decline[/color][/b][/url]
In the wake of overfishing, oceanic aquatic life is suffering. Relative to the historic levels, the population of bluefin in the Pacific ocean has dropped by 97%. Lack of proper regulation has allowed fishermen in some areas to harvest three times the sustainable rate per day. Given the current rate that these fish are removed from the ocean, experts estimate a 0.1 percent chance that the fish will return to normal levels. The fish species' surging popularity in culinary dishes is attributed to the massive population decline.

[url=http://www.foxnews.com/world/2016/04/20/declassified-memo-shows-multiple-saudi-connections-to-911-plotters.html][b][color=white]Saudi Arabia Accused of Being Tied to 9/11[/color][/b][/url]
With the declassification of investigative work by the FBI, the public has been made aware of some new information relating to 9/11. Multiple pieces of documentation show a tie between the plane hijackers and members of the Saudi government. There are currently 28 pages still classified that further detail Saudi involvement. These revelations have caused lawmakers to push to get that information declassified. As a result of the allegations, Saudi Arabia is threatening to sell its U.S. assets if the country is officially blamed for being involved with 9/11.

[url=http://globalnews.ca/news/2650706/canada-to-introduce-pot-legalization-legislation-in-2017/][b][color=white]Decriminalized Marijuana Coming to Canada[/color][/b][/url]
On April 20, 2016, the Canadian government made an announcement that it would seek to decriminalize marijuana. Canadian residents can expect legislation to be introduced in the Spring of 2017. This new legislation will not be met with overwhelming resistance, as the most recent polling of citizens showed that 68% are in favor of legalizing the recreational drug. However, the majority of citizens also think that this is not a major issue for the country. Critics have responded to the announcement by saying the decriminalization should have come earlier, and that failure to decriminalize earlier has caused thousands of additional people to now have criminal records. The former police chief of Toronto has said that as long as the law states marijuana is illegal, police will be enforce it as such.


[color=transparent]       [/color]
